metadata.title: Monitum de supplemento Collectionis Labbeanae conciliorum
metadata.creator: Labbe, Philippe, 1607-1667
Cossart, Gabriel, 1615-1674
Briasson, Antoine-Claude, 1700-1775, bookseller

Catholic Church. Sacrosancta concilia ad legiam editionem exacta
metadata.publisher: Parisiis :;Genevae : Apud Briasson, bibliopolam, viâ San-Jacobaea ;;Apud Fabri & Barrillot
metadata.description: Prospectus for a supplement to "Sacrosancta concilia ad legiam editionem exacta," Philippe Labbe and Gabriel Cossart's compilation of the councils of the Catholic Church
Also published in French under title: Projet d'un supplément à la Collection des conciles du pere Labbe

"Supplementum autem edetur iisdem typis, eadem forma, ac magnitudine quàm Labbeana collectio; atque exemplarium paucior erit numerus quae minori pretio ab iis ementur qui ea maturè sibi reservata volent. Nullum autem exemplar chartâ magnâ edetur, nisi expresè postulatum"--P. 2
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained, marked and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
